articles.author: Taylor Kerns
articles.title: 6 ways the Apple monopoly case could affect Android - Android Police
articles.description: Google Wallet on iOS? Apple News on Android? It could happen
articles.content: The US Department of Justice brought a lawsuit against Apple this week, alleging the company's practices have created an unfair monopoly in the US smartphone market. The full lawsuit is practically a… [+7810 chars]
